members.joinCircumstances: Member of the Franky Family from its founding

keyMoments.title: Confronting Zoro
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family reveals themselves and confronts Zoro, attempting to intimidate the swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: First major confrontation between the Franky Family and the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Multiple members of the Franky Family are easily defeated by Zoro, showing the gap in their combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that the Franky Family cannot defeat the Straw Hats in direct combat.

keyMoments.title: Stealing 200 Million Beli
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family successfully steals two suitcases containing 200 million beli from the Straw Hats while they are distracted.
keyMoments.significance: This theft becomes the catalyst for major events in the Water 7 Arc, including Usopp's beating and eventual temporary departure from the crew.

bases.description: The Franky Family's hideout and base of operations in Water 7

members.joinCircumstances: Founded and unified the Water 7 shipyards into Galley-La Company
One of five foremen at Dock One, specializing in mechanics and diagnostics

keyMoments.title: Kaku Agrees to Help
keyMoments.description: Kaku, a foreman from Galley-La Company, meets the Straw Hats and agrees to assess the Going Merry's condition.
keyMoments.significance: First interaction between Galley-La Company and the Straw Hats, beginning their business relationship.

keyMoments.title: Meeting with Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp visit Galley-La Company headquarters and formally meet President Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Galley-La Company as a central organization in the Water 7 Arc.

bases.description: The main headquarters and primary shipbuilding facility of Galley-La Company

jollyRoger.description: Company logo featuring a galleon ship design
